file.title: Events

p.text: Events are actions performed by the user (clicking, cursor moving, keys pressing) which can be registered by objects.

p.textAll: Every object has particular events to register. You can program registering of events in the Actions tab. After you've programmed it all actions inside of the event in the Actions tree would be executed only when the given event has occured (for example, after clicking).
